trekfont 0.9.6
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Show the complete font set

Source: R/trekfont.R
show_trekfonts.Rd

List all available Star Trek fonts contained in the package.

show_trekfonts()

Value

a character vector.

Examples

show_trekfonts()
#>   [1] "AmarilloUSAF.ttf"                 "Ba'ku.ttf"                       
#>   [3] "BernyKlingon.ttf"                 "Borg.ttf"                        
#>   [5] "CorporateURW.ttf"                 "Crillee.ttf"                     
#>   [7] "CrilleeItalicBT.ttf"              "DeltaFlyer.ttf"                  
#>   [9] "Enterprise.ttf"                   "Fabrini.ttf"                     
#>  [11] "Federation.ttf"                   "FederationBold.ttf"              
#>  [13] "FederationClassic.ttf"            "FederationClassicMovie.ttf"      
#>  [15] "FederationCrille.ttf"             "FederationDS9Title.ttf"          
#>  [17] "FederationHull.ttf"               "FederationStarfleet.ttf"
